message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $22,000 to start negotiations.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $10,000 is a little too low for me, I could be flexible. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Would $15,000 be too low?
